summary:
M_Followers is a standalone follower
A succession model of the past work.
descriptionHtml:
[I English is not almost speak][b][[/b]This sentence is a Google translation.]

[color=#fff0f5][b][size=6][i][M_Follower V3]
[/i][/size][/b][/color][b][color=#f1c232][size=3][Change Log][/size][/color][/b]
[size=2]□v1.1　A texture was compressed. + It was corrected in order to use autogenous healing magic.[/size]
[size=2]□v1.2   A texture was repaired.[/size]
[size=2]□v2.0   A new follower was added. + [/size][color=#ff7700][size=3]The residence was changed in the blue palace.[/size][/color]
[size=2]□v2.1   A correction file of battle AI was prepared.Please overwrite.[/size]
□v3.0   A new follower was added. + A power balance of a follower was reconsidered.

[color=#f1c232][b][size=5][About this mod][/size][/b]
[/color][size=2]□M_Followers is a standalone follower
□She is Essential
□A follower of the past work is repaired and it's added from here.

[size=6][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73929-0-1458832471.jpg[/img][/size]
□First follower :Matoi     □BodyType:7B Natural     □She can't get married.
□Fighting style/A battle with a shield is very strong for her.　When there are no shields, it's an ordinary follower.
□Matoi is in a kitchen in a blue palace.

[size=6][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73929-1-1458832471.jpg[/img][/size]
□Second follower :Mayahuel    □BodyType:UNP     □She can get married.
□Fighting style/She likes heavy armament and a weapon of both hands.
[/size]□Mayahuel is in a kitchen in a blue palace.

[size=6][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/73929-0-1459907742.jpg[/img][/size]
□Third follower :Mira Menhit    □BodyType:UNP     □She can get married.
□Fighting style/She does the battle which used the bow. A quick shot and the avoidance ability are the feature.
□She's on the second floor of the blue palace.
